prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Chromatic Percussion, Synth Lead, Drums, Bass, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, and a Synth Lead, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This song has no Guitar, but does include Drums, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, and a Synth Lead.

Style 3:
No Guitar is present in this song, but it does have Bass, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, and a Synth Lead.
